changeSet.author: coungard
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE delivery_order ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, status VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, created_by VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, created_date DATE NOT NULL, last_modified_by VARCHAR(128), last_modified_date DATE, city VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, district VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, receiver_name VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, receiver_surname VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, receiver_phone VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL )

changeSet.author: coungard
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE parcel ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, delivery_order_id INTEGER REFERENCES delivery_order (id), created_by VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, created_date DATE NOT NULL, last_modified_by VARCHAR(128), last_modified_date DATE, type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, weight NUMERIC(4, 2) NOT NULL )
